definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: I don't think that the Hakka transliteration is exactly right.
sentences.chinese: 我用英文写客家话可能是错的。

sentences.english: Hakka is one of the languages that were brought over from China.
sentences.chinese: 客家话是传自中国的语言之一。

sentences.english: In Hakha dialect, it means chickens prepared in salt.
sentences.chinese: 客家话的意思就是用盐经过特殊加工而做成的。

sentences.english: Therefore, Hakka speakers can be found throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 因此在世界各地都能找到说客家话的人。

definition: Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
Min dialects, spoken in Fujian Province, Taiwan etc
the first Chinese dialect dictionary, edited by Yang Xiong 揚雄|扬雄[Yang2 Xiong2] in 1st century, containing over 9000 characters
Taishanese, a language of the Yue language group 粵語|粤语[Yue4 yu3] spoken in Jiangmen 江門|江门[Jiang1 men2] and in the Chinatowns of North America
Gan dialect, spoken in Jiangxi Province
Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
